statements: UPDATE genetically_modified_crops SET genetic_type = 'GMO' WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE genetically_modified_crops SET modified_trait = 'Drought Resistance' WHERE crop_name = 'Wheat';
UPDATE genetically_modified_crops SET modified_trait='Herbicide Resistance' WHERE crop_id=1;
UPDATE genetically_modified_crops SET genetic_type='GMO', modified_trait='Increased Yield' WHERE crop_name='Corn';
UPDATE crops SET crop_name = 'Tomato', scientific_name = 'Solanum lycopersicum' WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE characteristics SET trait = 'Color', value = 'Red' WHERE char_id = 2;
UPDATE crops SET crop_name='Tomato', scientific_name='Solanum lycopersicum' WHERE crop_id=1
UPDATE characteristics SET value='High' WHERE char_id=3
UPDATE crops SET growth_stage = 'fruiting' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE traits SET description = 'Genetic trait associated with disease resistance' WHERE trait_name = 'Resistance' AND crop_id = 2;
UPDATE crops SET date_planted = '2022-05-15', genetic_info = '{"GMO": false}' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE traits SET description = 'Resistant to pests and diseases', dominant = true WHERE trait_name = 'Disease Resistance';
UPDATE crops SET description = 'This crop is known for its high yield and fast growth' WHERE name = 'Corn';
UPDATE crop_characteristics SET yield_per_acre = 100 WHERE crop_id = 1;
UPDATE crops SET description = 'This crop is known for its high nutritional value.' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE crop_characteristics SET growth_time = 120, yield_per_acre = 500 WHERE crop_id IN (SELECT id FROM crops WHERE species = 'Rice');
UPDATE crops SET name='Tomato', growth_period='Annual' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE crop_locations SET latitude=40.73061, longitude=-73.935242, altitude=10 WHERE crop_id=2;
UPDATE crops SET species='Tomato', genetic_traits='High yield, disease-resistant', growth_period='Year-round' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE crop_characteristics SET color='Red', size='Medium', shape='Round' WHERE id=1;
